Walmart's extensive range of essential goods at competitive prices makes it a key player as consumers prioritize value in their purchases.
Costco's membership model and focus on bulk purchasing align with the trend of consumers seeking value and savings.
Target's focus on affordable yet quality products positions it well to attract value-conscious consumers.
